metadata.synopsis: The player walks past the stables outside the inn and can determine this is the same ox they saw in Druid's Grove if they pass an insight check
metadata.how_to_trigger: When entering the Last Light Inn area, walk straight ahead to the stables. The devilish ox is in the first stable, with Toron stood outside it.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like that odd ox made it through the shadows.
